snippet: A party known as a hen do is a weekend-long ritual of love and admiration for the bride.
abstract: Bachelorette party in England, known a 'hen do,' is a weekend-long ritual of love and admiration for the bride given by her friends, who use traditional games with a dash of British quirk to create an experience that can be as emotional as the wedding itself.
lead_paragraph: A party known as a hen do is a weekend-long ritual of love and admiration for the bride.

headline.seo: In England, Bachelorette Parties of a Different Stripe
headline.main: For British Brides-to-Be, Hen Dos (and Don’ts)
headline.print_headline: For British Brides-to-Be, Hen Dos (and Don’ts)
